name: Flirtatious
description:
It's puzzle time! Connect all the neon pipes together to solve the puzzle and reveal high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls! Earn all the stars to beat record scores and unlock achievements.
Now with the Skip Level feature!
15 challenging levels
Uncensored content
Beat the record times to earn stars
Realistic graphics
Atmospheric music
30 achievements
Display girls from the gallery
Easily skip levels - unlock girls if you can't beat a level for more than 10 mins
